database.name: TestAndDemo6 regression test viewer: DDV only (using data from TestAndDemo4); nested treeview

screen.title: See TestAndDemo4 for the creation of database DBC4.
screen.subtitle: This DDV viewer has been installed without any database and enables access to a previously deployed database.
screen.query: SELECT "HR employees"."Id" AS "ID", "HR employees"."Employee Name" AS "Name", "HR employees"."date Hired /hq" AS "Hired" FROM "HR members"."HR employees"
